summary:
### **Sigma Healthcare Limited – ASX Announcement Summary**  

#### **Announcement Type: FY25 Results Notification**  
- **FY25 Full-Year Results Release Date:** 27 August 2025.  
- **Webcast/Conference Call:** 10:00 AM AEST (live Q&A available).  
- **Key Financial Adjustment:**  
  - FY25 statutory results include **12-month CWG (Chemist Warehouse Group) contribution (reverse acquisition accounting)**.  
  - Comparative 2024 financials provided (restated for reverse acquisition).  
  - Results will include **normalized P&L (excluding merger & integration costs, non-cash PPA adjustments)**.  
  - **Pro forma normalised P&L** to be provided, assuming merger effective 1 July 2024.  

#### **Financial Snapshot (30 June 2024 Comparative Data)**  
- **Revenue:** $3,294.4M  
- **Gross Profit:** $1,043.0M  
- **NPAT:** $539.7M  
- **Cash Balance:** $273.1M  
- **Net Assets:** $716.9M  

**No material trading or capital-raising actions identified.**  

*(Note: Emphasis on accounting adjustments due to CWG reverse acquisition; no new financing or material operational updates disclosed.)*
